DOC.brief_summary: In study investigate follow property transversus abdominis plane block healthy volunteer : 1 . Cutaneous analgesic distribution 2 . Muscular affection 3 . Reproducibility
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigating Properties Transversus Abdominis Plane Block
DOC.criteria: Capable American society anesthesiologist classification 1 2 Written inform consent Age 18 year American society anesthesiologist classification 2 Body weight 50 kg Body mass index > 35 kg/m2 Previous abdominal surgery Acute chronic pain Use pain medication le 24 h prior study start Allergy local anesthetic Pregnancy Breastfeeding
